authors: Illustrated Jason Heuser For The Washington Post
description: Trump wants to redesign the presidential plane and put the U.S. military in space. Why not do both?
title: A new Air Force One and a Space Force: Two incredible ideas that go great together
title_page: A new Air Force One and a Space Force: Two incredible ideas that go great together - The Washington Post
text:
In July, President Trump announced plans for an updated and redesigned Air Force One. “Air Force One is going to be incredible. It’s going to be the top of the line, the top in the world. And it’s going to be red, white and blue, which I think is appropriate,” he said. In March, he had also floated the idea of a sixth branch of the military, saying “we’re doing a tremendous amount of work in space, and I said, maybe we need a new force. We’ll call it the ‘Space Force.’”
What could be more incredible and tremendous than combining those ideas into Space Force One? Here’s what that might look like.
